title: How to write letter to an organization to permit me to join them - Quora

response.answer_text: (Date of Letter Written) (Address of the Organization) Dear Sir/Madam, my name is __(your name)____ and I am writing you today to inquire about joining your organization. I would like to join your join due to the reasons _______(write reasons as to why you would like to join the organization)_________. It would be great if I could be able to talk to with you or a member of the team to see how my experience could benefit the organization in any way. You may contact me through email (____put email____) or by calling me (_____put number______). Thank you for your time and consideration. I sincerely look forward to speaking with you in the near future. Yours sincerely, (your name)  Notes: It will be great if you can find out the contact person of the organization. Someone specific at the company to send the letter to, like the human resource director or executive in the department you are interested in .Your letter should include information like why the organization interests you and why your skills can help the organization. You need to sell yourself in the letter.Also, make sure that the letter is short and to the point without taking too much of the employer’s time.

Every open organization has a list of requirements to be able to join them. For example, the requirements can be academic, professional, etc. More likely than not, they will also have a special application form to join them. A fee may also be required. So, any letter will depend on the requirements to join and the availability of an application or not.
